ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Funds Retained Opening Balance field is blank when a Finance Summary with Record Type Endowment Fund Summary is created or updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Funds_Retained_Opening_Balance__c ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment_Fund_Summary', ISBLANK( Funds_Retained_Opening_Balance__c ) )
